title: Cereal killers is rebuilding
body: Hello fellow league players if you are reading this i am assuming you are looking for a ranked team and hopefully we are the one for you. I created he ranked team a while back simply for fun but to my surprise we were actually doing pretty well if i recall correctly we managed to win our first 6 games. Only a week or so after creating the ranked team however i began experiencing issues with my internet which made the team a whole lot less active. Today however my internet provider has informed that the problem is fixed so i am rebuilding the team. I am unsure at the moment which players from the team will be continuing to play with us however we will be recruiting new ones for sure so anyone of any rank is welcome to add me or message here for more information

replies.body:
Keen to play ranked 5s
G5 mid/jg player
ign: Vitrolix
Will be happy to join if you want me I mainly play support but trying to get better at other roles. So if you want to see how I go add me (ign Shisno)
Hello happy to join add me JAP, come test me out.

I can play most champs top and jg and go good I can play  maybe 1 or 2 champs mid good the rest il feed with lol I have a few champs for sup wen I play adc I go 0 20000000 0 so yer if you have a top or jg spot open im up for it il do sup mid as well pref top jg
